definition: faire le tour de la maison
je te tiens par la barbichette
gloss: I hold you by the goatee

notes: I wonder if this is a typo and should be "ma". "me" (or often "m' ")  is the 1st person singular clitic, its not really a word and there are no other items that are clitics, while the counterpart of the possessive determiner "ma", "mon" is included in the items. So I wonder if we can double check what was on the original form for this item.
